name: Mind Shift - Shifting Puzzle
description:
MIND SHIFT is a real challenge for your brain. In order to solve a puzzle, you have to shift our block to the Portal - sounds easy but becomes increasingly difficult after some of the almost 100 puzzles. Can you solve all the puzzles?

Features:
- Be brave and navigate through more than 100 exciting puzzles.
- Be smart and collect up to 3 collectibles in every single level.
- Be persistent and unlock new levels and features the more points you find.
- Be patient and more levels will be added over time.
- Become a master and solve even the hardest puzzles!
